| History                 = The '''Dove Gut tribe'''{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #16}} was one of the tribes of the [[Dark Elves]] of [[Svartalfheim]].{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}}

When Malekith returned from imprisonment from the [[Eljudnir|Hall of Nastrond]], in [[Hel]], he attacked the Dove Gut village and slaughtered all the '''Dove Guts''',{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}} leaving [[Waziria (Earth-616)|Waziria]] as the last survivor,{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}}{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #16}} whom he used as hostage when [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]], [[Sif (Earth-616)|Sif]], and the [[Warriors Three (Earth-616)|Warriors Three]] arrived. Malekith cut her arm off and threw her on them before fleeing the scene{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}} (all of this was possibly done in order to make Waziria appears as a traitor among the anti-Malekith forces, due to their past relation).{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #17}} She soon recuperated, in need for vengeance.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #14}}

| Trivia                  = Apparently, the stench of the Dove Gut tribe was close to the one of the [[Hag Wart Clan (Earth-616)|Hag Wart clan]] and [[Snake Face Tribe (Earth-616)|Snake Face tribe]], as those were the guess of [[Canker (Earth-616)|Canker]] when he saw [[Waziria (Earth-616)|Waziria]].{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #16}}
